name: Parking Towers
description:
Parking Towers is a hectic 2D platformer with a silly theme. Climb towers and dodge cars. Grab powerups to improve your jumps. Survive the Parking Towers!

This game was made as a school project for the Independent Video Game Design Program at Dawson College.

Controls:

Move — A/D or left/right arrow keys

Jump — W, up, or space

Menu — Escape

Repository link:

https://github.com/DurocIsCooking/ParkingTowers
